# Rust.Nmap.Network - IDS Lab Commander

[![Rust](https://img.shields.io/badge/Rust-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=rust&logoColor=white)](https://www.rust-lang.org/)
[![Docker](https://img.shields.io/badge/Docker-2496ED?style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&logoColor=white)](https://www.docker.com/)
[![Nmap](https://img.shields.io/badge/Nmap-0E83CD?style=for-the-badge&logo=nmap&logoColor=white)](https://nmap.org/)

Academic lab environment for IDS evasion testing with a complete control interface.

## Tech Stack

| Technology | Purpose |
|------------|---------|
| **Rust/Axum** | Web dashboard backend |
| **Docker** | Containerized IDS environments |
| **Snort 3** | Network IDS |
| **Suricata** | Network IDS/IPS |
| **Zeek** | Network analysis framework |
| **Nmap/Scapy** | Network scanning & packet crafting |

## Features

- Multi-IDS lab orchestration (Snort, Suricata, Zeek)
- 5 configurable security levels per IDS
- Real-time container management
- Attack cookbook with evasion techniques
- Web-based rule editing
